Description: Scarab carved from stone; underside incised with a possible hieroglyphic inscription encircled with a patterned rope; lower half of underside broken off.
Curator's comments: Scarab not yet located, published by Petrie (Petrie 1886, pl. XXXVIII, no. 181). Petrie, W.M.F. 1886, Naukratis. Part I, 1884–5 (Third Memoir of the Egypt Exploration Fund), London.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXVIII, no. 181)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (OA.83) (phase 3)
